items.question: Can I try Rainbow for free?
items.answer: Yes. The Essential plan is free forever with no credit card required. It includes messaging, 1-to-1 calls, group chats, and 16 GB storage.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: Subscriptions are billed monthly per user via credit card (Stripe). Select your number of licenses, pay, and you're set. Add or remove licenses anytime. Cancel anytime.

items.question: Is Rainbow secure?
items.answer: Rainbow is ISO 27001 certified, GDPR/CCPA compliant, with TLS 1.3 and AES-256 encryption. Data centers in EMEA, NA, APAC, and CALA.

items.question: Can I change my number of licenses?
items.answer: Yes. Increase or decrease licenses anytime from your dashboard. Changes are prorated.
